experiences.name: Weekn
experiences.description: Co-founded Weekn, a platform experimenting with AI-driven social interactions and data visualization. Led technical strategy and built full-stack systems combining conversational agents, thread simulations, and interactive city visualizations for research and public engagement.
highlights: Designed and deployed large-scale thread simulation and visualization systems
Built cross-platform solutions (web, mobile) integrating AI pipelines and data analysis
Directed technical roadmap as CTO and co-founder

experiences.name: The Tide LAB
experiences.description: Contributed to The Tide LAB, presented at the 2025 Venice Biennale Architettura, exploring how AI can enable large-scale, real-time dialogue across geographies, disciplines, and generations. Built the end-to-end pipeline of a multilingual conversational AI agent with agentic retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) over a knowledge base of processed online conversations.
highlights: Developed multilingual AI conversational pipeline from scratch in under 3 months
Integrated 80% state-of-the-art AI tools released less than six months before launch
Presented at an event with over 300,000 visitors and global media attention

experiences.name: DATOCenter
experiences.description: Working on the vision of DATOs—Decentralized Autonomous Trustless Organizations—designed to overcome the coordination challenges of DAOs. Building governance engines powered by GenLayer’s Intelligent Contracts to achieve trustless decision-making for non-deterministic problems. Inspired by the manifesto: 'Bitcoin delivered trustless money. Ethereum delivered trustless computation. GenLayer delivers trustless decision-making. DATO will deliver trustless governance.'
highlights: Shaped early-stage governance standards for decentralized autonomous organizations
Explored frameworks for adaptive, transparent, and accountable decision-making
Contributed to the development of DATO as a future of credibly neutral governance
